body.p: Before beginning the installation procedure it is important to verify that your target system conforms to the minimum specifications to run Terma JAWSÂ© Server.

ul.li: Minimum of 2 CPUs (300 is the recommended number)

Installation of Oracle Java 1.8 or higher
(This can be obtained from https://java.com/download)
The background image is of Nate Thurmond during his years with the Warriors.
